short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes a specific HTML pattern from Passmedicine and allows toggling its visibility.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to remove the question visibility from passmedicine.com questions in order to test the knowledge without the hint of visible answers. Toggleable on and off
